alert.note: Alert for Eastern Lincoln County; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 11 at 2:29AM MDT until April 12 at 8:00AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 AM MDT TUESDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 9 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Sandia and Manzano Mountains including Edgewood, and Eastern Lincoln County. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 8 AM to 9 PM MDT Tuesday. For the Wind Advisory, from 2 PM this afternoon to 8 AM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Lincoln County; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood
